text: Joe Salisbury (born 20 April 1992) is a British professional tennis player. He is currently ranked world #1 in doubles. He is a four-time Grand Slam champion. He won the 2020 Australian Open and the 2021 US Open in men's doubles partnering Rajeev Ram. Salisbury has also won two mixed doubles titles, at the 2021 French Open and 2021 US Open mixed doubles with Desirae Krawczyk. Salisbury made his Davis Cup debut for Great Britain in 2021, and also competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics with Andy Murray. Category:British male tennis players
title: Joe Salisbury
